name: TALK TO ME AI
description:
this game is about an AI that tells you where to move! It is simple like that!

the game is short (and kinda mediocre) but I'm gonna make some more levels like this to my main project

CONTROLS

  • <A> move to the left
  • <D> move to the right
  • <W> move to the up
  • <S> move to the bottom

MUSIC MADE BY

 Kaganobik - Junkyard Robots 

AlexMakeMusic - Space

Developed/Made by: Cody

VOICE LINES RECORDED WITH Robot Voice Generator

Godot Game Engine USED TO MAKE THIS GAME
